feed.title: Ben’s Blog
feed.subtitle: Welcome to Ben's blog. He made it, and he loved every minute of it.

entry.title: IT’S ALIVE!
entry.content: It only took ten months, but I have finaly got around to publishing the Jekyll blog I promised back in October of last year when I first bought this domain. It’s a little bland and bare at the moment, but I promise that will change over the coming weeks. fingers crossed
entry.summary: It only took ten months, but I have finaly got around to publishing the Jekyll blog I promised back in October of last year when I first bought this domain. It’s a little bland and bare at the moment, but I promise that will change over the coming weeks. fingers crossed
